name: Copy of POC-Create CNow Ticket for Immediate Termination 2

Get Identity.description: Gets Identity so we can pass information to emails
Get Identity.displayName: Get Identity To Pass Attributes to Email Templates

attributes.body:
<html>
<head>
   <meta charset="UTF-8">
   <style type="text/css">
.table1 {
  border: none;
  padding: 0px 40px 10px 27px;
  color: #333333;
  width: 100%;
  border-collapse: separate !important;
}
.table2 {
  border: none;
  padding: 0px 20px 0px 35px;
  color: #333333;
  width: 100%;   
}
.table3 {
  border: none;
  padding: 0px 20px 0px 45px;
  color: #333333;
  width: 100%;   
}
.Padding {
margin-left: 27px;
width: 100%;
}
.center {
text-align: center;
font-style: italic;
}    
.font {
font-size: 16px;
}
.container {
display: flex;
}
.div{
width: 20px;
height: 20px;
}
</style>
</head>
<body>
   <p> The following user has been terminated. Please review and remove their access to any regulated applications. <br/></p>
  <ul>
       <li><b>Employee Number:</b> {{$.getIdentity.attributes.personNumber}} </li>
       <li><b>Employee Name:</b> {{$.getIdentity.name}} </li>
 <li><b>Primary Location:</b> {{$.getIdentity.attributes.locationDescription}} </li>
   </ul>
   <p> Thank you,<br/>
Caesars Identity and Access Management Team<br/></p>
   <br/>
</body>
<footer>
    <p>
       <a 

       </a>
    </p>
    <br/>  
    <p>
If you feel that you have received this email in error, please immediately notify the Caesar's Service Desk at 1-877-438-4457 and delete this email from your system. This email and any attachments may contain confidential or legally privileged information that is intended only for the individual(s) named in this email. If you are not the intended recipient, or an authorized representative of the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any review, dissemination, disclosure, copying, or reliance upon the contents of this email or its attachments is strictly prohibited.
    </p>
</footer>
</html>
attributes.subject: Automated Termination Request - {{$.getIdentity.attributes.personNumber}}

Verify Data Type.description: check to see if user has a mobile device

Verify Data Type 1.description: check to see if user has william hill

attributes.description:
Trigger Immediate Termination under these conditions:
Complete Termination: 'N' to 'Y'  
Termination Date: Current date minus one day (Current date -1) 
Status: From 'Active' to 'Inactive'
